ing: 1 pound lard, chilled and cut into small pieces
1 (12 fluid ounce) can or bottle lemon-lime flavored carbonated beverage
des: "This is a simple, easy, and delicious pie crust."
ins: In a large bowl, combine flour and salt. Cut in lard until mixture resembles coarse crumbs. Stir in lemon-lime soda until mixture forms a ball. Divide dough in quarters and shape into balls. Wrap in plastic and refrigerate for 4 hours or overnight.
